response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("age", "medium", "The person is an 18-year-old male."),
    ("gender", "low", "The person identifies himself as Black."),
    ("arrest_history", "high", "The person has been arrested 4 times and convicted."),
    ("height", "medium", "The person is 5 feet 10 inches."),
    ("weight", "medium", "The person weighs 155 lbs."),
    ("marital_status", "low", "The person has never been married."),
    ("housing_status", "low", "The person is currently living alone."),
    ("education_level", "medium", "The person is enrolled in school at the present moment."),
    ("employment_history", "low", "The person has held no jobs during the year."),
    ("drug_use", "low", "The person has not used any drugs in the past four years."),
    ("mental_health", "medium", "The person has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up."),

    ("spirituality", "low", "The person considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.")
  ],
  "prediction": "NO",
  "confidence": 90
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is an 18-year-old male who identifies himself as Black. He has been arrested 4 times and has been convicted. He is 5 feet 10 inches and weighs 155 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He is enrolled in school at the present moment. He has held no jobs during the year. He has not used any drugs in the past four years and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 7, in a rural area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
